channel.title: Editing the cache and deobing?
channel.description:
Hello, I felt that I would ask three questions in the same topic to save room so I do not spam.
[u]Question #1[/u] I have heard many people say they have "edited the cache". What is in this cache, and how do they edit it?
[u]Question #2[/u] I have seen many topics about editing textures, but is there any way to use a progrom like mspaint or anything like that to edit the graphics? Also can I edit NPC looks?
[u]Question #3[/u] I know many people have said deobing. I sort of know what it means, but how do you do this? and do you need software? If so where can I get software to deob? ohh and what is the full word that deob means?

item.title: Editing the cache and deobing?
item.dc:creator: @evank3 evank3
item.description:
@evank3 wrote:

Hello, I felt that I would ask three questions in the same topic to save room so I do not spam.

Question #1
I have heard many people say they have “edited the cache”. What is in this cache, and how do they edit it?

Question #2
I have seen many topics about editing textures, but is there any way to use a progrom like mspaint or anything like that to edit the graphics? Also can I edit NPC looks?

Question #3
I know many people have said deobing. I sort of know what it means, but how do you do this? and do you need software? If so where can I get software to deob? ohh and what is the full word that deob means?
